answerText: Rio Grande [or Big River][10] Between the Pecos and Rio Grande in southern New Mexico, the United States military maintains this giant missile test range, which includes the site where Trinity was detonated.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 3 | 2 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: In honor of the end of Breaking Bad, demonstrate your knowledge of Albuquerque and New Mexico. [10] Albuquerque lies on this River, which travels into Mexico before meandering north again to form most of the Texas-Mexico border.
